title:
recently thousands of Jelly fish washed up on shore at Wrightsville Beach,my questions are how long can they survive out of the water and can they still be alive until the next tide takes them back out to the ocean ?



thank you lou hamlin
text:
Reporter Kate Queram is doing a story that should answer your
jellyfish question. I'll send you a link when it appears at
StarNewsOnline.com. Thanks for inspiring a story with your question
